resources.string: Do you want to close the app?

Welcome to Vegginner! This prototype has:

* Recipes where you could list them as favorites. Furthermore, you could save its ingredients for the shopping list widget.

* Places where you could find out what kind of veg-friendly places are around you.
Sorry! There are no recipes to show
Sorry! The author removed this recipe
Come back to the main list
Sorry! There are no events near you
Enable the internet connection. Do you want to load the list again?
Please, if the problem persists, contact with the author. Do you want to load the list again?
Just an image to decorate or points something
Black background to read recipe titles better
Button to save or delete recipes
Check icon to show the ingredient is bought
Image which represents a place type

Hi, this is a mock sentence
Sorry! There are no places near you
Please, let vegginner locate your device to show veg-friendly places near you.
To continue, please turn on GPS
Coming soon! Visit my repository https://github.com/juancoob/Vegginner
